EmailTemplate.name: Migration: Valid Credentials Received
EmailTemplate.subject: Your BigCommerce Catalog Transfer: We’ve started!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi there,
We’ve received your credentials and have assigned your migration to one of our dedicated technicians. Over the next 10­-12 days, we’ll carefully copy your data to a new BigCommerce store. When we feel confident, we’ll reach out and invite you to spot check our work and give the final stamp of approval before we move your store to the setup phase.
What should I do while I wait?
1) Check out our handy­dandy resource to answer to your burning questions:
If you can keep selling on your current store (spoiler: yes!) What's included in your data migration What to expect during your data migration What you should be doing during your data migration How to get up and selling on BigCommerce
http://info.bigcommerce.com/hs-fs/hub/213342/file-1966252846-pdf/Data_Migration_FAQ.pdf?t=1414443502715
2) Get ready to open for business with BigCommerce. You'll want to gather items like login credentials, access codes and preferences for your current online store. Focus on gathering information around:
Which payment gateway fits your needs? - https://support.bigcommerce.com/articles/Public/Available-Payment-Gateways
You current shipping provider
Your current tax settings
Need an SSL certificate? - https://support.bigcommerce.com/articles/Public/Installing-an-SSL/?q=ssl+certificate&l=en_US&fs=Search&pn=1
Thanks,
The BigCommerce Team
